videoSnippet.title: He Just Knows the Answer
videoSnippet.description:
Photos by Eric Rosen
Have a great day :)

Sevian, Samuel (2692) - Carlsen, Magnus (2830) 
MrDodgy Invitational 3.0 | Knockout (chess24.com) [30] 2022.11.30
C55 Two knights defence (Modern bishop's opening)

1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Bc4 Nf6 4.d3 Be7 5.O-O O-O 6.Nc3 d6 7.a3 h6 8.h3 Re8 9.Re1 Bf8 10.d4 Bd7 11.Be3 exd4 12.Nxd4 Ne5 13.Ba2 c6 14.f4 Ng6 15.Qd3 Qa5 16.e5 dxe5 17.b4 Qd8 18.Qxg6 Nd5 19.Bxd5 cxd5 20.Qg3 exd4 21.Bxd4 Rxe1+ 22.Rxe1 Bf5 23.Re5 Bxc2 24.Rxd5 Qe8 25.Re5 Qd7 26.Nd5 Kh7 27.Qf2 Rc8 28.Bxa7 Bb3 29.Ne3 f6 30.Rh5 Qd3 31.Bc5 Bf7 32.Rh4 Rxc5

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:25  Game Starts!
01:20 Completely New Game!
06:25 Pause the Video!
07:30 It was in This Position
09:08 Contributions

The chess Bundesliga is one of the world’s top chess leagues, with the 16 teams competing for the German Championship attracting some of the world’s best players. Each team plays each other once over the season, with a team on any day consisting of 8 players from a starting list of 18. A match win earns two match points and a draw is worth one. For the final standings match points come first, followed by game points. The season is split into six weekend double rounds, starting at 2pm on Saturdays and 10am on Sundays in four changing venues around Germany. The rounds 11-15 are played in one long weekend in Berlin.

Players receive 100 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 50 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Official website: www.schachbundesliga.de
